trans-unit.source: Represents a discovery document.
This class cannot be inherited.
XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services, given an URL.
The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension.

The discovery document, which is an XML document, contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as a service description, XML Schema Definition (XSD) language schema, or another discovery document.

This class represents the contents of the discovery document; where the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> property contains a list of the references contained within the discovery document.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> class.
Returns a value indicating whether the passed <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> can be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that is tested whether it can be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> can be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Namespace of the discovery XML element of a discovery document.
A discovery document contains references to documents describing Web Services.
These references are XML elements contained within a discovery XML element.
That discovery XML element is a member of the XML namespace specified by the Namespace constant.
To be added.
Reads and returns a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> from the passed <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
The <xref:System.IO.Stream> from which to read the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
Reads and returns a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> from the passed <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> from which to read the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
Reads and returns a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> from the passed <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> from which to read the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
A list of references contained within the discovery document.
A discovery document contains references to information about the existence of XML Web services.
These references can refer to service descriptions, XSD schemas, or other discovery documents.
The References property contains a list of these references.
An <xref:System.Collections.IList> containing the references within the discovery document.
Writes this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> into the passed <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
The <xref:System.IO.Stream> into which this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> is written.
Writes this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> into the passed <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> into which this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> is written.
Writes this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> into the passed <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> into which this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> is written.
